## usePointerEvent() function

Subscribe to pointer events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function usePointerEvent<E extends HTMLElement>(eventType: MouseEventType, handler: NativeMouseEventHandler, options?: UsePointerEventOptions<E>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventType | [MouseEventType](./react-hooks.mouseeventtype.md) | type of pointer event to subscribe |
|  handler | [NativeMouseEventHandler](./react-hooks.nativemouseeventhandler.md) | callback that will be invoked when pointer event dispatched |
|  options | [UsePointerEventOptions](./react-hooks.usepointereventoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> configuration options for hook |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
